mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H' ) as time, COUNT( DISTINCT id) as count FROM sys_order WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND extension_user_id = #{extensionUserId} AND status=#{status} GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
mapper.sql: id, order_id, money, price, type, pay_no, param, pay_time, pay_tag, status, create_time, update_time, goods_id, open_id, extension_user_id, user_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_order (order_id, money, price, type, pay_no, param, pay_time, pay_tag, status, create_time, update_time, goods_id, open_id, extension_user_id, user_id, goods_snapshot) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extensionUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsSnapshot,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
